title: where did these comics come from? (sig)
content:
hi, just wondering what the website is to find the comic in my sig. i thought it would be neat to have weekend mail take notice of it [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

i think rocketjess and allstories had it and one of them had the link from their sig... i cant remember. i got the link from the testing topic (old one) which is kinda destroyed (backup problem or somthing).

anyway, thanks.---------
[img]http://img250.echo.cx/img250/9885/comicstrip9vf.gif[/img]

title: Re: where did these comics come from? (sig)
content: I'm sorry, I have no idea. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] I read all the strips when I visited the site ages ago, but it would be nice to read the new ones as well (in case it's updated since).Eat your veggies!
